page.title: 09N.H.S. GENERAL HOSPITAL
page.content: {BANGOUR GENERAL HOSPITAL }WAS FIRST OPENED TO THE PUBLIC IN{1940.}DURING THE SECOND WORLD WAR LOTS OF BRITISH SOLDIERS WERE TREATED AT BANGOUR FOR {BURNS}AND WOUNDS.A DOCTOR FOUND OUT THAT{SALT WATER}MUST BE GOOD FOR BURNS BECAUSE AIRMEN THAT HAD BEEN SHOT DOWN OVER THE SEA WERE HEALING QUICKER THAN THOSE THAT HAD BEEN WOUNDED ON LAND.BANGOUR NOW EMPLOYS AROUND 1700 DOCTORS AND NURSES,THERE ARE MANY WARDS IN THE HOSPITAL.THERE IS NOW A NEW VALVE WHICH WILL ENABLE PEOPLE WITHA SPEECH PROBLEM TO TALK PROPERLY.IT WILL BE CALLED THE{BANGOUR {VALVE.}A NEW HOSPITAL IS BEING BUILT IN LIVINGSTON. THE HOSPITAL IS HOPING TO EMPLOY DOUBLE THE AMOUNT OF PEOPLE.BANGOUR WILL BE DEMOLISHED,UNLESS ANYONE IS INTERESTED IN BUYING IT.
